pr_title: Fixed arraysOutOfBounds exception when copying pattern geometries to …

timeline.message: Fixed arraysOutOfBounds exception when copying pattern geometries to new trip patterns

timeline.bodyText: Should be sufficient to just add a comment here explaining why a length mismatch would occur (realtime update adding stops) and clarifying that this will only preserve geometry up to the added stop, at which point it will fall back on straight lines.
timeline.author: abyrd

replies.bodyText: I have added the comment now.
